text: Panayiotis Michael Zavos (), or Panos Zavos (, ), is a Cypriot physiologist. He has been criticized for making dubious claims about his ability to clone humans. He claims to have cloned and implanted human embryos. His allegations, have been strongly rejected by doctors, lawmakers, religious and pressure groups after he failed to show any proof. == References == == Other websites == * Professor Zavos Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:People from Lexington, Kentucky Category:Cypriot people
title: Panayiotis Zavos
